{"id":717902569,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1654756483,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/717902569/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        \n        int ans =0 ;\n        int end =0 ;\n        int start =0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m;\n        for(int i =0 ;i<s.size();i++){\n            char c = s[i];\n            map <char ,int> :: iterator it ;\n            for(auto it :m){\n                if(it.first == c && it.second >=start && it.second <end){\n                   start = it.second+1;\n                }\n            }\n            m[c] = end++;\n          ans  = max(ans ,end-start);    \n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
